Translations.Text: Niscaya tomara pratipalake jane ye, tumi chalatara babe thiya diya ketiyaba raatira praaya du'i-trtiyansata, ketiyaba ardhansata arau ketiyaba eka-trtiyansata arau tomara lagata thakasakalara eta dale'o thiya diye. Arau allahe'i nirdharana karae dina arau raatira paraimana. Te'om jane ye, tomaloke iyara sathika nirdharana palana karaiba noraaraiba, seye te'om tomalokaka ksama karaile. Eteke tomaloke kora'anara paraa yimanakhini sahaja haya simanakhini patha karaa. Te'om jane ye, tomalokara majara kichumana asustha hai paraiba, akau kichumane allahara anugraha sandhana karaibalai bhramana karaiba arau ana kichumane allahara pathata yud'dharata arasthata thakiba. Seye tomaloke kora'anara paraa yimanakhini sahaja haya se'ikhini patha karaa; arau tomaloke chalata pratistha karaa arau yakata pradana karaa lagate allahaka uttama rna pradana karaa. Tomalokara nijara mangalara babe tomaloke yi agatiyakai praerana karaiba seya allahara ocarata paba. I utkrstatama arau puraskara hicape bara mahat. Allahara ocarata ksama praarthana karai thaka; niscaya allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu
He bastraabrta
utha, arau satarka karaa
arau tomara pratipalakara sraesthatba ghosana karaa
Arau tomara pochaka-paraicchada paraitra karaa
arau aparaitrata (sbirka) paraihara karaa
arau adhika poraara asata kako anugraha nakaraiba
Arau tomara pratipalakara babe'i dhairya dharana karaa
Eteke yetiya sinata phum diya ha’ba
se'i dinato ha’ba eta sankatara dina
yito kaphirasakalara babe sahaja nahaya
Yaka ma'i akalasaraiyakai srsti karaicho taka mora hatata erai diya
Arau yaka ma'i pradana karaicho bipula dhana-sampada
arau (pradana karaicho) nityasangi putrabora
Arau taka pradana karaicho sbacchanda jiranara pracura upakarana
tathapi'o si kamana karae ye, ma'i taka arau adhika di'om
ketiya'o nahaya, si amara nidarsanasamuhara biraud'dhacarai
Anatipalame ma'i taka (jahannamara picala silata) araohana karaibalai badhya karaama
Niscaya si cinta karaile arau sid'dhanta grahana karaile
Eteke si dhbansa ha'oka! Kenekai si (e'i) sid'dhanta grahana karaile
akau si dhbansa ha'oka! Kenekai si (e'i) sid'dhanta grahana karaile
tara pichata si laksya karaile
Tara pichata si bhraum koca khoraale arau mukha bikrta karaile
Tara pichata si ubhatile arau ahankara karaile
Tara pichata si ka’le, ‘eya purbarae paraa cali aha yadura bahirae ana eko nahaya’
‘eyato manuharae'i katha’
Anatipalame ma'i taka chakbarata (jahannamata) praraesa karaama
Arau kihe tomaka janaba chakbara ki
i eko arasista naraakhiba arau erai'o nidiba
I sarairara chala jbala'i ka'la karai diba
Chakbarara tattbaradhanata ache unaisajana (praharai)

Arau ami kerala phiraistasakalake'i jahannamara tattbaradhayaka bana'icho; arau kaphirasakalara paraiksasbaraupa ami sihamtara sankhya nirdharana karaicho yate kitabapraaptasakale drrha bisbasa karae, arau muminasakalara imana brd'dhi paya arau yate kitabapraaptasakale arau muminasakale sandeha posana nakarae; arau yate iyara phalata yihamtara antarata byadhi ache sihamte arau kaphirasakale kaya, allahe e'i (sankhyara) udaharana di ki bujaba bicaraiche? Enekai allahe yaka iccha pathabhrasta karae arau yaka iccha take'i hidayata pradana karae; arau tomara pratipalakara sain'yabahini samparke te'omra bahirae ana konorae najane; arau jahannamara e'i udaharana manuhara babe eta upadesa matra
Ketiya'o nahaya, candrara sapata
raatira sapata, yetiya iyara arasana ghate
prabhatara sapata, yetiya i alokojjbala haya
niscaya jahannama mahabipadasamuhara an'yatama
manuhara babe satarkakaraisbaraupa
Tomalokara majata yiye agrasara ha’ba bicarae athaba pichamuraa ha’ba bicarae tara babe
Pratyeka byakti nija krtakarmara babe dayabad'dha
kintu sompanthi lokasakalara bahirae
jannatata te'omloke ijane sijanaka sudhiba
aparaadhibilakara bisaye
kihe tomalokaka chakbarata (jahannamata) niksepa karaiche
sihamte ka’ba, ‘ami chalata adayakaraisakalara antarbhukta nachilo
‘arau ami dukhiyaka khadya dana karaa nachilo
arau ami anarthaka alocanakaraisakalara lagata behuda alaca karaata magna achilo
Arau ami pratidana dirasaka asbikara karaichilo
arasesata amara ocarata mrtyu ahi pale’
Eteke chuparaichakaraisakalara chuparaiche sihamtara kono upakara nakaraiba
Eteke sihamtara ki haiche, kiya sihamte upadesa banira paraa bimukha haiche
sihamte yena bhita-santrasta hai palayanarata banaraiya gadha
Yiborae sinhara bhayata palayana karaiche
Baram sihamtara majara pratyeka byaktiye'i kamana karae ye taka unmukta grantha pradana karaa ha'oka
Ketiya'o nahaya, baram sihamte akhiraataka bhaya nakarae
Ketiya'o nahaya, niscaya e'i kora'ana sakalorae babe upadesabani
Eteke yara iccha si iyara paraa upadesa grahana karaka
Arau allahara icchabihina konorae'i upadesa grahana karaiba noraarae teraemi bhayara yogya, kerala te'omrae'i takbaraa aralambana karaa, arau teraemi ksama karaara adhikarai
